老王英文版的免责：
此应用仅用于学习和保护用户隐私。 我们被禁止让您做任何其他方式，这个程序不承担任何责任。 如果您违反法律，我们将协助政府调查您的犯罪。 如果您不同意以上所有陈述，请自觉删除此应用程序。 通过使用此应用程序，您默认同意所有上述声明，谢谢您的理解。

This app only for learning and protect user privacy. We are forbidden let you do any other way and this app does not take any responsibility. If you breaking the law, we will assist government investigate your crime. If you do not agree to all the above statements, please consciously remove this application. By using this application, you agree to all the above statements by default, thank you for your understanding.
